meanings.definition: A humorous drawing, often with a caption, typically in a newspaper or magazine.
meanings.sent1: I laughed at the funny cartoon in the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: The cartoon in the magazine made me smile.
meanings.sent3: The cartoonist's clever drawings always bring joy.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination turned the world into a colorful cartoon.
meanings.sent5: The cartoon of the talking animals was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A simplified or exaggerated representation of something, often used in animation or comics.
meanings.sent1: The cartoon character had big eyes and a small body.
meanings.sent2: I love watching cartoons on Saturday mornings.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon version of the city was so cute.
meanings.sent4: His actions were like a cartoon, larger than life.
meanings.sent5: The cartoon of the superhero was so cool.
